title: 794: BITCOIN SUPPLY SHOCK INCOMING - 7 REASONS WHY THIS BTC BULL RUN WILL EXTEND INTO 2022!!
description:
In glad tidings for an orange Christmas, BTC supply is drying up to lows not seen for years. 

Popular crypto analyst Lark Davis thinks the Bitcoin and overall crypto market bull run will extend well into 2022.

Davis tells his 779,600 Twitter followers that he has seven reasons why he’s optimistic about a price surge next year.

For complete show notes and for the full premium experience with video, visit: http://CryptoNewsAlerts.net
